desc: Premium Golf Gloves - Available in Multipacks of 3: Coral Red x1, Navy Blue x1, and Tan Beige x1. Great value, at less than $15 per glove. AAAA Cabretta Sheepskin Leather. Providing a players glove feel, at a fraction of the price!

layout.text: Premium AAA Cabretta Leather – Advanced long lasting and durable performance leather golf glove.
